thread.section_title: Relais Christine - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely Left Bank hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely Left Bank hotel - Review of Relais Christine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: William B
title: Lovely Left Bank hotel
text: Relais Christine is a seasoned treasure among Left Bank Parisian hotels, all of which tend to feature small rooms and occasionally interesting architectural arrangements (such as a lovely private bathroom . . . up a flight of stairs from the bedroom). Relais Christine provided a small but beautifully redecorated room, which had a luxurious modern bath (shower only) and (unfortunately, in my view, but typically French) the toilet in a separate closet. Friendly service and great location.
